text: In practice, legally, if someone has been using the software in good faith with every reason to believe that they were in compliance with its license and then when they learn that is not the case they make every reasonable effort to come into compliance, then they’re going to be fine in any court

elements.text: In practice, legally, if someone has been using the software in good faith with every reason to believe that they were in compliance with its license and then when they learn that is not the case they make every reasonable effort to come into compliance, then they’re going to be fine in any court

text: Yeah, but the people panic pulling their repos and crashing the Ruby CI ecosystem is bonkers.
